name: Yury Khashchavatski
description: Belarusian film director and scenarist. Member of the Union of Cinematographers of Belarus. Author of more than thirty films, many awarded prizes at international festivals.

timeline.info: Born in Odessa, Ukraine
Graduated from Odessa Technological Institute
After distribution in Minsk worked as a freelance writer with the Belarusian TV
Graduated from Russian State Institute of performing arts
Was at the forefront of the Minsk Association of Jewish Culture, he joined the board of this organization, but soon left it because of disagreement with the methods of management.
Was a member of the Board of Directors of the World Association of Belarusian Jews
Before the presidential elections was a member of staff Seeds Domasha.

works.info: It is a quiet life in the Deep

awards.info: For the film "It's a quiet life in the Deep": Grand Prix of the All-Union Festival of TV films in Kiev
For the film "There was a Wing": Grand Prix of the All-Union Festival of TV films in Minsk
For the film "Recruits": Grand Prix film Belarus (Minsk)
For the film "Counterclaim": Grand Prix "Golden Centaur" International Film Festival "Message to Man" (St. Petersburg)
For the film "Russian happiness": Prize "Ostankino" for best TV movie and a prize at the International Film Festival in Yekaterinburg. "Golden Gate Award" (San Francisco)
For the film "Oasis": Jury Prize International Film Festival of environmental films (Freiburg)

For the film "Ordinary President": The Sakharov Prize rasiїskaga Writers Union "April" (Moscow). "Peace Film Award" at Berlin Film Festival (Forum). Grand Prix Human Rights Watch (New York, 1998). "Golden Gate Award" (San Francisco, 1998)
For the film "Prisoner of the Caucasus": Grand Prix of the World Organization Against Torture - International Documentary Film Festival in Geneva. Gold Award International Film Festival in Belgrade

timeline.info: Born in Baku, he spent his childhood in Azerbaijan.
After World War II the family moved to Hrodna
Vladimir graduated from the school with honors, he decided to become a filmmaker.
He graduated from the Belarusian State Theater and Art Institute. During his studies he worked as an assistant director at the National Film Studio "BelarusFilm"
He worked in BSSR Gosteleradyo (filmmaker-director creative association "Telefilm")

works.info: The guy from the village of White
Between a star and a candle
Argentine syndrome. In search of paradise

timeline.info: Born into a Jewish family in Vitebsk Velizh province (now - the administrative center of Velizh district of Smolensk region)
He graduated from the Vitebsk Art College
All-Union Institute of Cinematography
In 44 years of work in the Belarusian cinema took many famous documentaries
During the 2nd World War was the cameraman on the West and the 3rd Belorussian Fronts

works.info: State of emergency in the city

awards.info: Honored worker of BSSR arts

name: Joseph Veynerovich
description: Soviet cameraman and director of documentary films

timeline.info: It began its work in the cinema as an operator at the studio Belgoskino.
He graduated from the Faculty of the State College of Cinematography
During World War II frontline operator groups of the Central Documentary Film Studio, filming frontline and partisan chronicle.
Director of the operator studio Beldyarzhkino - "BelarusFilm".
During the anti-Semitic campaign was excommunicated from work.
He worked at the Institute of Mechanization and Electrification of Agriculture BSSR Junior Researcher
Restored to its original work BelarusFilm.

awards.info: Prize winner of the Stalin Prize
BSSR State Prize - for the film "General Pushcha"
People's Artist of the BSSR

name: Leo Golub
description: Belarusian film director, screenwriter. People's Artist of the Belarusian SSR, Honored Artist of Poland. Winner of all-Union and international awards in the field of cinematography.

timeline.info: Born in the city of Yekaterinoslav (now Dnipro)
He studied at a teacher’s seminary in Yekaterinoslav.
He graduated from the State College of Cinematography (now the All-Russian State University of Cinematography named after S. A. Gerasimov)

He worked as a director at the Sovkino studio (1928 - 1934).
1934-1937 - at the Odessa film studio,
1937-1938 - at the Kiev film studio,
1938-1941 - at the Moscow film studio of popular science films,
1940-1941 - at the Minsk film studio,
1941 - at the Mosfilm film studio,
1941-1943 - at the Central United Film Studios of Feature Films - TsOKS (Alma-Ata),
1943-1946 - at the Novosibirsk film studio of popular science films
Started work at the Belarusfilm film studio
He was the art director of the training studio of the film actor at the Belarusian Theater and Art Institute.

awards.info: Honored Artist of the BSSR
People's Artist of the BSSR
Prize of the Lenin Komsomol of Belarus
Prize of the USSR Ministry of Education at the International Film Festival in Moscow.
BSSR State Prize for the film "Oginsky Polonaise"

name: Victor Dashuk
description: Belarusian documentary filmmaker. USSR State Prize Laureate. Honored Artist of the Byelorussian SSR, People's Artist of the Byelorussian SSR.

timeline.info: Born in the village Dies Khoyniki district of Gomel region
He graduated from the faculty of journalism, BSU
Powered by studio "BelarusFilm" - he was an administrator, operator assistant director
Director, cameraman, scriptwriter in documentary and feature films.
He graduated from the Higher Courses for Scriptwriters and Film Directors in Moscow (Department of film directing workshop L. Trauberg)
Professor of the Belarusian State Academy of Arts, the head of the studio directing documentary films

works.info: The War is not a woman's face

awards.info: Laureate of Lenin Komsomol of Belarus Prize
Honored worker of BSSR arts
The prize "Silver Dove" at the International Festival in Leipzig for the film "I Met You"
Winner of the USSR State Prize for the series of films "I am from the village of fire" and "War is not a woman's face"
People's Artist of the Byelorussian SSR
Winner of the honorary diploma of the jury of the 42nd International Film Festival in Krakow
